thread.title: Hero MotoCorp ‘Splendor Pro’ bike launched priced at Rs 46,850
thread.title_full: Hero MotoCorp ‘Splendor Pro’ bike launched priced at Rs 46,850 | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: Hero MotoCorp ‘Splendor Pro’ bike launched priced at Rs 46,850
text:
Hero MotoCorp ‘Splendor Pro’ was launched on Monday priced at Rs 46,850 (ex-showroom Delhi) – this is a new version of the ‘Splendor Pro’ bike by the country’s largest two-wheeler maker.
The new Hero Splendor Pro will go on sale at dealerships across the country from Tuesday, the first day of the auspicious Navratra, which marks the beginning of the festive season, Hero MotoCorp said in a statement.
Besides, retail sales of Hero’s new scooter Maestro Edge, priced at Rs 49,500 (ex-showroom Delhi), will also commence from tomorrow, it added.
The company has also launched a variant of Splendor+, with a ‘self-start’ feature, thus adding to the convenience and comfort of riding a Splendor.
Splendor, which has crossed 2.5 crore sales milestone in cumulative sales since its launch in 1994, is one of the most successful motorcycle brands in the country.
 12, 2015 8:52 pm
